species.name: dugtrio
descriptions: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.
Despite the closeness between this Pokémon and farmers and other people, no one has ever seen the parts of it concealed underground.
Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.
Dugtrio’s heads are sleek and smooth and incredibly hard. It can dig through any soil with its headbutts.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: tangling-hair
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
